Reviews.Content: reviews below sad left hotel feeling incredibly pleased encounter staff beyond pleasant genuinly welcomed 3 4 staff minutes arrival starting exit taxi followed glasses champagne friendly escort theme excellent service 3 day stay clean decorated nicely bit im didnt bother definitely returning hotel pleased

Reviews.Title: “Hotel let perfect strangers check us out early of our pre-paid room and stay there with our passports and belongings”

Reviews.Content: stayed times seen types larger suites spacious roomy standard cost location relatively theres subway close walking distance tribeca restaurantsbars probably short cabride les village village theres bar scene downstairs cant hear noise reduction device main downside staff service spotty boutiqueish type hotels staff bit aloof attitude fine nightclub 500night hotel
